entry.title: VPS - BHS2 - host271338
entry.content:
Jan 5, 21:07 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host271338

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.

entry.title: [BHS8][Dedicated Servers] - BHS0812A05A
entry.content:
Jan 5, 17:09 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/01/2023 04:10 UTC 
End Time : 05/01/2023 17:08 UTC 
Root cause : A water leak caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 4, 17:58 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are still working on the problem. Impacted servers are progressively becoming reachable again.

Jan 3, 19:14 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are still working on a fix. We will provide update as significant progress are made.

Jan 2, 06:40 UTC
Identified - Start time : 02/01/2023 04:10 UTC 
Service impact : Some servers are temporarily unreachable in rack BHS0812A05A
Root cause : A water leak caused the incident
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem. We estimate that the servers will be reachable tomorrow the 03/02/2023.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
